name: Enchantment Secret Hideaway
description:
Welcome to the magical world of Thicket Wood, where you will embark on an exciting adventure full of hidden objects and challenging puzzles!

In Enchantment: Secret hideaway, your task is to help the fairies locate hidden fragments of various magical objects scattered throughout Thicket Wood. As you progress, you will explore different locations featuring three different modes: fragmented, matching pairs, and all of a kind. Through the game you will also find jigsaw, swap puzzles and hangman word game with beautiful enchanted pictures!

Enchantment: Secret hideaway is sure to put a spell on you and provide hours of fun and entertainment!
